root.description: Caught in a severe storm, a small band of Zoombinis seeks shelter in a mountain cave. Now the Zoombinis find themselves trapped in a hazardous tunnel where mysterious creatures lurk. The Zoombinisâ€™ escape rests squarely on your shoulders, or more accurately, on your brain. With nine perplexing puzzles and three levels of difficulty, each perilous challenge will test your mathematical thinking skills-which include organizing information, reasoning with evidence, and testing systematically.
